arm5e.sheet.combatInstructions1: Equip weapons and armor to see the totals.
arm5e.sheet.combatInstructions2: If your specialty is with the shield, mark it on the shield and not on the weapon. If you don't have the shield equipped, the specialty bonus doesn't apply.
arm5e.sheet.combatInstructions3: Create a 'mounted' item with the ability to 'mount' and mark on its attributes that it is a horse. When you equip it, the calculations will be applied.

arm5e.sheet.name: Name
arm5e.sheet.notEquipedWeapon: You cannot use an unequipped weapon
arm5e.sheet.setAbilities: Create abilities for your character that match the labels below. This ensures correct calculations. If you don't have the ability, you can still create it and set to zero and assign it.
arm5e.skill.category.label: Category
arm5e.sheet.buildingsSumary: 1 pound per 10 pts Inhabitants (50% per craft)
arm5e.sheet.consumablesSumary: 2 pounds per 10 pts Inhabitants (20% per craft)
arm5e.sheet.laboratoriesSumary: 1 pound per 10 pts Laboratories (20% per craft)
arm5e.sheet.provisionsSumary: 5 pounds per 10 pts Inhabitants (50% + 20% per craft)
arm5e.sheet.weaponsSumary: 1 pound per 320 points Weapons and Armor (50% per craft)
arm5e.sheet.writingMaterialsSumary: 1 pound per Magus and book specialist (50% per craft)

arm5e.spell.targets.baseSize.label: Base size
arm5e.spell.targets.baseSize.co: Adult human being, up to Size +1
arm5e.spell.targets.baseSize.he: Plant roughly one pace in each direction
arm5e.spell.targets.baseSize.ig: Large campfire or the fire in the hearth of a great hall
arm5e.spell.targets.baseSize.me: A mind is a mind, no size
arm5e.spell.targets.baseSize.te: Depend on material, from 10 cubic paces (sand, dirt) to 1 cubic inch (gem)
arm5e.spell.targets.baseSize.vi: A spell or depend on the effect

arm5e.lab.planning.msg.notSkilledInvent: Not skilled enough to invent that spell.
arm5e.lab.planning.msg.visExtracted: {num} pawns of Vim vis extracted from the aura.
arm5e.lab.planning.msg.visExtracted2: Vis vim extracted from the aura of {covenant}.

arm5e.dialog.design-effect-question: Do you want to design a magical effect based on that base effect?
arm5e.dialog.design-spell-question: Do you want to design a spell based on that effect?
arm5e.dialog.design-enchantment-question: Do you want to design an enchantement based on that effect?
arm5e.dialog.delete-question: Are you sure you want to delete that item?
arm5e.dialog.botch.title: Checking for botch
arm5e.notification.unconscious: This character is unconscious, no action possible...
arm5e.notification.pendingCrisis: This character has a pending aging crisis, no action possible... Resolve the crisis by clicking the skull next to the character name
arm5e.notification.codex.none: You don't have a Actor of type 'magicCodex' in your world, some functionality will be disabled/not working, you can import the one in the Magi compendium
arm5e.notification.codex.tooMany: You have more than one Actor of type 'magicCodex in your world, some functionality is based on the uniqueness of magicCodex, you may want to delete one (after merging if needed)
arm5e.notification.codex.enchant: You need a Codex actor with enchantments to enchant this way.
arm5e.notification.crucible.no.invest.po: Item's size and material are not good enough for this level of enchantment.
arm5e.notification.notPossibleToCalculat: We cannot calculate the wound (check the size of your actor)
arm5e.notification.roll.botchNum: Please enter the number of botch dice.
arm5e.notification.doubleAbility: That character already have the ability
arm5e.notification.noMightPoints: Not enough points remaining in might pool.
arm5e.notification.setDate: The current date has been set to {season} {year}
arm5e.notification.synchActors: All actors have been synchronized to {season} {year}
arm5e.notification.missingSpell: Spell "{spellName}" doesn't exist anymore or has moved. Aborting.
arm5e.notification.notMagus: This character is not a magus/maga.
arm5e.notification.noLab: This character doesn't own a lab.
arm5e.notification.noOwner: This laboratory doesn't have an owner.
arm5e.packs.abilities.name: Abilities
arm5e.sheet.activeEffect.info.noedit: Note: Active effect creation is not possible if the Item is owned by an Actor, edit the original or make a copy in your world to edit.
arm5e.aging.roll.label: Aging roll
arm5e.aging.roll.normal: Apparent age increases by one year.
arm5e.aging.roll.crisis: Gain sufficient Aging Points (in any Characteristics) to reach the next level in Decrepitude, and Crisis.
arm5e.aging.roll.StrStaPts: 1 Aging Point in Str and Sta.
arm5e.aging.roll.DexQikPts: 1 Aging Point in Dex and Qik.
arm5e.aging.roll.ComPrsPts: 1 Aging Point in Com and Prs.
arm5e.aging.roll.IntPerPts: 1 Aging Point in Int and Per.
arm5e.aging.crisis.label: Crisis
arm5e.aging.crisis.minorIllness: Minor illness. Stamina roll of 3+ or CrCo20 to survive.
arm5e.aging.crisis.seriousIllness: Serious illness. Stamina roll of 6+ or CrCo25 to survive.
arm5e.aging.crisis.majorIllness: Major illness. Stamina roll of 9+ or CrCo30 to survive.
arm5e.aging.crisis.criticalIllness: Critical illness. Stamina roll of 12+ or CrCo35 to survive.
arm5e.aging.result0: As sand through the hourglass, so pass the seasons of life...
arm5e.aging.result3: It resulted in a health crisis.
arm5e.aging.rollback.title: Revert effect of aging roll
arm5e.aging.rollback.confirm: This action will revert the effect of aging and delete the diary entry. Are you sure?
arm5e.aging.manualEdit: {name} lost one point in {char} due to aging.

arm5e.activity.msg.wrongSingleItemXp: No more than {param} XP can be assigned to a single ability, spell or art.
arm5e.activity.msg.wrongTotalXp: Total experience ({param}) must be equal to source.
arm5e.activity.msg.missingMotherTongue: Childhood must include a living language at level 5 (75 xps).
arm5e.activity.msg.wrongOption: The option chosen ({param}) is not valid with current progress items.
arm5e.activity.msg.uselessTeacher: {param} has nothing to teach to this character.
arm5e.activity.msg.tooManyItems: Too many progress items, maximum is {param}.
arm5e.activity.msg.gainCapped: The experience gain has been capped to {param}, the student will equal the master.

arm5e.scriptorium.msg.tractAlreadyRead: The reader has already read a tractatus of the same title.
arm5e.scriptorium.msg.illiterate: The reader doesn't know how to read.
